stories.title: ‘Futurama’ Revival Ordered at Hulu with Multiple Original Cast Members Returning

stories.text:
I've a problem with my AdWords account being paused and hoping anyone can help as the standard channels are making no progress.

This has happened when updating a few accounts from Individual to Organisation as a requirement to keep running Ads.

Basically I've submitted paperwork 11 days ago with this and 3 other accounts in a batch request. The guys updated 3 of the 4 billing profiles. The other 3 accounts (all pretty much identical to the one not done and standard ads, nothing dodgy grey zone to the rules) were updated quickly but seem to have missed one.

I've been following this up every day or 2 for over a week now and they keep telling me the account will be fixed today + they will contact me with update later that day but neither ever happens.

Now the account is paused and I've a very pissed off client.

Does anyone here have weight in Adwords world that could help? Something seems to be broken in the request process. I can't find any other escalation option so here I am.
stories.title: Ask HN: Google Adwords Support Assistance

stories.text:
I have been a software developer in an large organization for more than a decade. I have ADHD and see’s a psychiatrist every 3 weeks. Boss is now demanding access for to all my health records or said he will fire me. He has also locked my Active Directory account (he says temporary) and deactivated my building pass until I sign the document for HR to obtain all my medical records.

I have till Monday (less than a week) to sign the document.

I am located in Australia.

Should I sign the document so my employer has access to all my medical records and all the psychiatrist's notes on me?

TL;DR ADHD Software Developer. Employer demands access to all information in my medical records.

Letter I am forced to sign to keep my job is below:

Link: https://imgur.com/a/Qpvw9M6
stories.title: Ask HN: Should I give my employer all my medical records?
